CustomField.description: The Operating Company Number (OCN) is an alphanumeric code that is used to identify the Legal Name of the Local Service Provider (LSP) that owns or controls the NPA-NXX or End Office Switch that is associated with the 10 digit Local Routing Number (LRN). OCN codes are assigned and maintained by the National Exchange Carriers Association (NECA).
CustomField.label: OCN Code
